name: Cashboard
headline: Cashboard is the analytics hub for finance teams
tags: industry:finops; industry:fintech; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:collaboration; location:new-york

founders.name: Julian Rowlands, Founder
founders.description: Scruffy & kind.  Scrappy jersey kid made good.  Rutgers history major -> Chicago Booth MBA -> worked all over Africa & Asia for 3 years -> startup finance leader -> raised $124m from Accel/Bessemer/Kleiner/YC/more -> started Cashboard in Spring '22.  Son of a writer.

generated_description:
**Cashboard: The Analytics Hub for Finance Teams**

Founded in 2021 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, Cashboard is revolutionizing how finance teams access and analyze their data. Based in New York, the company has a compact team of six talented employees, all dedicated to building a powerful analytics platform designed specifically for financial professionals.

At its core, Cashboard provides an analytics hub that enables finance teams to efficiently streamline their reporting processes. Gone are the days when companies needed to invest in large analytics teams for custom solutions. Cashboard empowers CFOs to run data-driven businesses with ease. It allows teams to rapidly generate internal reports, share insights securely across departments, and enhance their overall feedback cycles.

### Key Features

- **Centralized Data**: Cashboard aggregates live data from various business systems via seamless API integrations, ensuring that users always have accurate, real-time information at their fingertips.
  
- **Automated Data Mapping**: The platform keeps data source mappings updated, allowing users to create filtered views instantly without cumbersome setups.

- **Drill-down Capabilities**: With just a click, users can dive deep into detailed data to extract valuable insights.

- **Customizable Reports**: Create an array of financial statements and custom tables. Whether you need Budgets vs. Actuals or income statements, Cashboard has you covered.

- **Interactive Visualizations**: Transform raw data into engaging charts, tables, and maps, helping teams to visualize and understand their metrics at a glance.

- **Team Collaboration**: Cashboard facilitates easy sharing and interaction with data across teams. With Team Boards, you can create customized dashboards tailored to specific groups, while also controlling who sees what data to maintain confidentiality.

- **Integration Ready**: Offering over 200 integrations, Cashboard connects smoothly with popular platforms like QuickBooks, Salesforce, and Xero, allowing organizations to leverage their existing data systems without hassle.

### Mission and Vision

Cashboard's mission is simple yet compelling: to be the ultimate analytics hub for finance teams, easing the burden of data management and reporting, and fostering a culture of accountability and insight in organizations.

If you’re looking to supercharge your finance operations without the headache of hiring additional staff, Cashboard is worth exploring. They are determined to make world-class analytics not just accessible but also a norm for CFOs everywhere.

For more information and to see the platform in action, visit [Cashboard](https://www.cashboard.co) today. Whether you're a growing startup or an established company, Cashboard positions itself as a transformative tool in the fintech landscape.
